QuestData.Title: Robbing Hoods
QuestData.Description: We're all going to die!!!$B$B<You slap Megs to calm her down.>$B$BSorry about that, $G Mr. : Ms.; $n. Okay, we need to find a way to get a lot of moolah quickly.$B$BThere are reports of the Trade Prince sending hired looters into the streets.$B$BYou could take the hot rod out there and run them down, snatching the loot that they've illegally stolen. There wouldn't be anything wrong with that, right?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use your Hot Rod to run over 12 Hired Looters, collecting 12 Stolen Loots in the process.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to steal a whole bunch of stolen loot?
QuestData.RewardText: Wow, you really did it?! Well, they had it coming, I guess.$B$BThat's an awful lot of loot. Do you think it's enough to get you a spot on the Trade Prince's yacht?$B$BAre you going to be able to bring anyone with you? I don't make too much working in marketing.
